code: export var isAuthenticated=function isAuthenticated(){if(typeof window=='undefined'){return false;}if(localStorage.getItem('token')){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('token'));}else{return false;}};export var getUserEmail=function getUserEmail(){if(typeof window=='undefined'){return false;}if(localStorage.getItem('user')){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'));}else{return false;}};export var HandleLogout=function HandleLogout(){localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('user');window.location.reload();};
